attributes.title: death

attributes.review: When I got the app everything was suspicious. I saw pictures and cutouts of Donald Trump that had horrendous accessories, like MAGA hats, MAGA clothes, MAGA signs! Like what is this? MAGA is a very derogatory term that should not be used in the year 2020. This word is so offensive and horrible, I can’t believe you are advocating that. Secondly after I got the app the people messaged me about bla bla bla and then all of a sudden I have the SWAT team kicking down my doors to send me some Trump flag. They ruined over 100 grand worth of things in my home and I expect them to pay me back. I will go into details to show you how furious I was when they left. I was watching Fox News and I hear blades like from a helicopter. I assumed it was just a regular helicopter going by but no. This fully armed chopper landed on the roof of my home so suddenly, there were pieces of my house falling down from the ceiling. Then my house was surrounded by SWAT members with big cannons and bazookas. I was so afraid I tried to hide under my coffee table but that didn’t work. Someone lifted the coffee table and threw it out a window shattering it and making glass fly everywhere. That coffee table was a vintage designer table from Italy! It was made in 1852! That cost me 23,000 dollars! Then they started blowing Trump merch out of their cannons making holes in the walls of my house. They grabbed all the Trump flags and hung them all over. On the indoor ceiling, the outdoor roof, my bedroom, the other bedrooms, the bathroom, the kitchen (they even stripped all of my sheets and put on confederate flag comforters they did the same with my couches and chairs and dressers and pillows and shower curtains and even my welcome mat). As I was shaking in fear hiding in the corner. President Trump came flying into the house and came directly up into my face and spit all over me then gave me a big fat hug and after it was over I had orange tanner all over me along with his strands of hair! Then he said to me “Oh how grateful I am to have another trusty amazing supporter, but might I say you are quite ugly and fat and smelly and hairy and alien looking.” I was in shock, in tears almost. I threw the remains of my white refrigerator at him and he had red in his eyes. all of a sudden he took my phone and said, “No more phone for you, you worthless fat b**** you are just a lazy girl now you can’t use my awesome cool spectacular app!” I broke down into tears and he slapped me on the face! Then he body slammed me into the ground breaking my leg, nose, right arm, collarbone, tailbone, cheekbone, pelvic bone, all of them all 180 bones in my body. He left me there in the crippling dust of what used to be my loving home to die. AND I BLAME THIS APP.
attributes.title: THIS APP IS A CURSE IT IS FORBIDDEN IN MY HOUSEHOLD
